sys_script.name: Email Address Syntax Validate

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_f0e662411b51211035918559cc4bcb0e
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_939193_my_app_needit</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Email Address Syntax Validate</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	 var isEmail = validateEmailAddress(current.u_requested_for_email);
  // If isEmail is false (email address syntax is not valid) do not save
  // the record.  Write an error message to the screen.
  if(isEmail == false){
    gs.addErrorMessage(current.u_requested_for_email + " is not a valid email address.  You must provide a valid email address.");
    current.setAbortAction(true);
  }


})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-02-27 06:08:15</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>f0e662411b51211035918559cc4bcb0e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Email Address Syntax Validate</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="My App" source="x_939193_my_app">9c551aec1b1fd11035918559cc4bcb49</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="My App">9c551aec1b1fd11035918559cc4bcb49</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_f0e662411b51211035918559cc4bcb0e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-02-27 06:08:58</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=f0e662411b51211035918559cc4bcb0e"/></record_update>
